subject: Shipping Status Inquiry - Order #SSN4832
description_text:
Hello,

My order number is *#SSN4832*, placed on Dec 14th for the HS Pro Shifter.
According to the product page, shipping was scheduled to begin on Dec 19th.

However, my order status is still showing as *"Unfulfilled"* on the
website. Could you please check if my package has already been dispatched?
If so, I would appreciate it if you could provide the tracking number.

I am very much looking forward to receiving the product. Thank you.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10160 中
